title: How to Make Jhatpat Bhindi (Okra Based Indian Vegetable Dish)

steps.headline: Heat oil on medium level in a pan for about 2 minute(s).
Add onions, and stir fry till they are very lightly brown.
Add red chili powder, turmeric powder, coriander powder, cumin powder and garam masala.
Fry this again for a few seconds.
Add the okra and the slit green chillies.
Add a dash of lemon and sprinkle salt to taste.
Cover and cook on low heat for about 5 minutes or till the okra is cooked but firm.
Garnish with chopped coriander leaves and serve.

text: Heat oil on medium level in a pan for about 2 minute(s).  Add onions, and stir fry till they are very lightly brown.  Add red chili powder, turmeric powder, coriander powder, cumin powder and garam masala.  Fry this again for a few seconds.  Add the okra and the slit green chillies.  Add a dash of lemon and sprinkle salt to taste.  Mix well.  Cover and cook on low heat for about 5 minutes or till the okra is cooked but firm.  Garnish with chopped coriander leaves and serve.
